Who We Are

A prestigous co-ed institution honing the skills and ability of our future citizens by fulfilling needs with good deeds. We aim at serving the mind and the heart to their fullest and thus satisfy those who seek us. We are an organization with our destiny dertermined that is to carve our name at places via our students.

We Contribute to the Greater Society.

Learn More

What it's like to be a Notre Damian.

Emphasis on Academics

We concentrate on Academics than any other extra-curricular activities. The teachers tend to make each child in the room understand, like really understand the content.

Secure Ambiance

Classrooms and vicinity are well-sheltered and secured with CCTV-cameras. Surrounding the school are agricultural fields in north and east. Transport facilities by bus are provided.

Labs | Smart Classrooms

We are well-equipped for practical teaching with Laboratories for different subjects to let students know how things are done. Smartclassrooms provide visual knowledge to the students.

Sense of Integration

We try to invoke a sense of integration among the teachers, students as well as the parents/guardians. This consequently enhances communication and social skills in children.

More

Testimonials

<< swipe >>

Notre Dame is an excellent place for learning and development of students. They serve a creative, supportive and productive environment. Education is treated as worship here. All the faculties are extremely supportive and knowledgeable. All the subjects as well as concepts are taught thoroughly using simple and easy methods.

Primary Student

During these tough times when lives are seeing complete paradigm shift, children are going through a major transition and who else to comfort them apart from the parents but their teachers. We sincerely thank the efforts by the teachers to make this unknown difficult journey easier for our kids. We are very happy to have chosen the right institution.

Father of High Schooler

There's real alchemy, the ingredients being the perpetual kindness, the thoughtfulness, the imagination, the fun, the skill and technique, the reassuring blend of modernity and glorious timelessness. The school serves goodwill, simple and traditional values, and joy. I know I am satisfied, but this is nothing but fantastic.

Parent of Primary Schooler

Notre Dame focuses on improving my son’s areas of need and really puts a huge emphasis on bolstering his individual strengths. The teachers are highly educated, thoughtful, and nurturing. They provide rigorous academic challenges, as well as the tools and strategies needed to face those challenges. I am so pleased and full to be a part of the fam.

Parent of High Schooler

It is a little jewel box of a school that is overflowing with love, kindness and a sense of service. My child has improved in a way that he never would have at any other school due to this excellent individualized and warm environment. Thanks for such an environment.

Parent of Middle Schooler

Never thought schools can be so amazing! Studying at Notre Dame has always been fun even in pandemics. We missed school days instead of holidays because teachers are so co-operative and engaging that two years are not enough to assimilate their knowledge.

High School Student

Management

In 1837 Fr.Basil Moreau, the Founder of the Congregation of Holy Cross envisioned education as a weapon of significance for empowering the young for a better and brighter world and to uplift the falling society of France.
